ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), 'Waitlist'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Validating Dates')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Lost')), NOT(ByPassValidation__c), $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: On opportunity in Waitlist can only be moved to Validating Dates or Closed Lost.
